name: Gwent Cards
author: Zolmeister

sections.description:
Display tooltips for Gwent Cards. Optionally automatically detect cards on the page.

Use the following tag in posts: [gc en=””][/gc]
en=”” is optional if the name is already english.
e.g. [gc en=”Ciri”]シリ[/gc]
e.g. [gc]Ciri[/gc]

Enable Magic Links in the settings menu for automatic detection (beta).

Supported Languages:
Deutsch (German)
English (English)
Español (Spanish)
Español (al) (Latin America)
Français (French)
Italiano (Italian)
日本語 (Japanese)
Polski (Polish)
Português (Portuguese)
Русский (Russian)
官话 (Chinese – Simplified)
简体中文 (Chinese – Traditional)

This plugin uses an external API at “https://gwent.io/api/obelix/v1/exoid” to fetch the latest card data and translations (cards are being updated constantly).
Card images are served from a CDN (cdn.zolmeister.com).
sections.faq:
How do I use it?

Use the [gc][/gc] tag in posts like so:
This is [gc en=”Ciri”]シリ[/gc]
If the name is english, en= can be omitted.
This is [gc]Ciri[/gc]

What are Magic Links?

Simply use the full name of a card (e.g. ‘Ciri’) with capitalization in a post.
The plugin will take care of the rest.
This setting must be enabled on the settings page
sections.changelog:
06/16/17

  • Default to tag-based links, create settings option to enable magic linking

05/26/17

  • Updated card list from Open Beta changes

short_description: A plugin to detect and provide detailed card information automatically for Gwent cards
